description: JSON schema for a quantify schedule.

label.description: A unique label of this instance of the operation.

rel_time.description: relative time between the the reference operation and this operation.

ref_op.description: The label of the reference operation.

ref_pt.description: reference point in reference operation must be one of ('start', 'center', 'end').

ref_pt_new.description: reference point in added operation must be one of ('start', 'center', 'end').

operation_hash.description: hash of the operation in the operation dict.

operation_dict.description: A dictionary of operations. Keys correspond to the hash attribute of operations.
